com.silvergobletgames.sylver.graphics

Class OpenGLGameWindow.SylverRenderDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.silvergobletgames.sylver.graphics.OpenGLGameWindow.SylverRenderDelegate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jogamp.opengl.util.awt.TextRenderer.RenderDelegate
    Enclosing class:
    OpenGLGameWindow

    public static class OpenGLGameWindow.SylverRenderDelegate
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.jogamp.opengl.util.awt.TextRenderer.RenderDelegate
    This class is used by the TextRenderer to do fancy things. It is instantiated when we build a new TextRenderer.
